name: RecordMyDesktop
description: RecordMyDesktop is a desktop video recording software. You can record the full screen, window, specified area, audio and video. Meanwhile, videos can be generated in ogg format by setting the parameter control.

en_US.description: RecordMyDesktop is a desktop video recording software. You can record the full screen, window, specified area, audio and video. Meanwhile, videos can be generated in ogg format by setting the parameter control.
en_US.name: RecordMyDesktop

zh_CN.description: RecordMyDesktop是一个桌面视频录制软件，可以录制全屏、窗口，指定区域，还可以录制音频，同时通过设置参数控制将视频生成ogg格式。
zh_CN.name: RecordMyDesktop
